Scorponok/Sniper/Oinker


Scorponok gets shot in the face as he sees them run off. "Blast 
yo....." Scorponok falls to the ground. He enter Statius lock.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Sniper continued running from the base. He was getting slagged
baddly. 
Sniper continued running till he was outside of the ark. He was about 
to walk in when those autoguns fired on him. Sniper backed up till he 
was out of range. He looked threw his scope until he spotted the 
entrance to the base. There Were no bots coming out. Odd. Sniper sent 
a transmission to the ark. "Hello, anybody there." (NOTE:Sniper 
doesn't know they moverd to the CF. I'm not sure if anybody is 
patrolling the ark or not. So if I dont hear a responce later today,
I 
will guess no one at the ark.)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Oinker opens the door to the brig with his gun drawn, "Ennybody in 
hyar."
___________________________________________________________________


(Now to address this "Firestorm" You calling me a moding piece of 
crap. You don't even now half of what happen while you were gone. So 
you are making assumtions of something wrong when it might not be 
wroung because we were in a certain postion before you came. And here 
is a suggetion. Don't go complaining when you just join. Not a good 
impression. Also you are moding to, I believe. If I am thinking
right, 
your character landed then walk right up to the Predacon base and is 
controling their autoguns, without even being acepted into the 
Predacon rank yet. YOU ARE NOT ON THE PREDACON FRIEND LIST, SO THE 
AUTOGUNS WOULD FIRE ON YOU, THEY WOULDN'T LISTEN TO YOUR CHARACTER.
To 
all that had to sit there and read another complaint, I am truly 
sorry, but I needed to reply, because, If I didn't some of you would 
think that I am a Scardy Cat, which I am not.)
